summary:
**Groundhog Day (1993 film)**

"Groundhog Day" is a funny movie about a weather reporter, Bill Murray, who gets stuck in a time loop, repeating February 2nd over and over. While covering a festival in Punxsutawney, Pennsylvania, he learns valuable lessons while living the same day multiple times. The film was directed by Harold Ramis and also stars Andie MacDowell. It became very popular and is now considered one of the best comedy movies ever. It even inspired a musical and a video game.
